body_html: When you run ./configure before calling bazel build you are asked to provide compiler flags in one of the steps. Do NOT provide any compile options at that point as the default is -march=native which enables all the CPU specific instructions.
body_text: When you run ./configure before calling bazel build you are asked to provide compiler flags in one of the steps. Do NOT provide any compile options at that point as the default is -march=native which enables all the CPU specific instructions.
body: When you run `./configure` before calling `bazel build` you are asked to provide compiler flags in one of the steps. Do NOT provide any compile options at that point as the default is `-march=native` which enables all the CPU specific instructions.
